content: प्रदक्षिण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Being placed or standing on the right, moving to the right. {@--2@} Respectful, reverential. {@--3@} Auspicious, of good omen. --णः, --णा, --णं Circumambulation from left to right, so that the right side is always turned towards the person or object circumambulated, a reverential salutation made by walking in this manner; <ls>Ku. 7. 79</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 232.</ls> --णं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} From left to right. {@--2@} Towards the right side, so that the right side is always turned towards the person or object circumambulated. {@--3@} In a southern direction, towards the south; <ls>Ms. 3. 87.</ls> (प्रदक्षिणीकृ or प्रदक्षिणयति <ab>Den.</ab> <ab>P.</ab> means ‘to go round from left to right’ as a mark of respect; प्रदक्षिणीकुरुष्व सद्योहुताग्नीन् <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; प्रद क्षिणीकृत्य हुतं हुताशनं <ls>R. 2. 71</ls>).
